channel.title: Adventure Items
channel.description: Find a D&D adventure to give your character the perfect piece of swag.

item.title: WBW-EP - The Witchlight Carnival
item.description: a potion, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
The Witchlight Carnival

A 4 Hour Season 11 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on September 22, 2021

Your journey for the safe return of a treasured possession has led you back to the Witchlight Carnival: a spectacular event of games, music, food, and friendship. However, strange things are afoot, and it's up to you to find out what they are and who is behind them.

Content Warning

Fairytale abduction, magical charm

Items

  • Cupcake of Invisibility (Potion of Invisibility) Very Rare
  • Potion of Advantage Uncommon

Story Awards

Witchlight Monarch

item.title: WBW-PR - Lost Things
item.description: Book of Memory, Fold-Up Friend, Giant Gloves, Pocket Watch, Wand of Whimsy, Whoopee Cushion, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Lost Things

A 2 Hour Season 11 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on September 22, 2021

Like a half-forgotten dream, the Witchlight Carnival drifts into our world once every eight years, drawing folk of all ages to delight in its fey wonders. Entry without a ticket is strictly forbidden, and the consequences for trespass echo through time.

Content Warning

Fairytale abduction, magical charm

Items

  • Book of Memory Common
  • Fold-Up Friend Common
  • Giant Gloves Common
  • Pocket Watch Common
  • Wand of Whimsy Common
  • Whoopee Cushion Common

Story Awards

With a Hoot and a Growl

item.title: WBW-DC-FDC-01 - The Ember King
item.content:encoded:
The Ember King

A 2 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on September 20, 2021

The Tavern of the Ember King appears during the Feast of the Moon in an alleyway in Waterdeep. The tavern is the hospitable domain of the pixies who spark embers in campfires. New adventurers can go here to begin their journey in the Feywild, and veteran adventurers meet inside for drinks and stories. Coin isn’t needed here – food and drink can be purchased for a tale. For new Feywild explorers, the benevolent Ember King offers advice and their first adventure in exchange for the tale of their exploits. Once agreed, the now pixie-sized party finds themselves at the top of the tavern and have one hour to find their way to the bottom.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Bianca Bickford Designer
  • Kelly Knox Editing
  • Del Teigeler Tavern Illustration
  • Marissa Louise Tavern Colorist
  • MC-Illustrations Character Illustration
  • Dean Spencer Additional Illustrations

item.title: WBW-DC-FDC-04 - The Monster of Wonderia
item.description: Bag of Holding and a potion
item.content:encoded:
The Monster of Wonderia

A 2 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on September 20, 2021

The adventure takes place in the new Feywild Domain of Delight, Wonderia, a magical land where childlike fey creatures called wonderfey live. In this adventure, the characters are summoned to Wonderia by wonderfey. The wonderfey ask the characters to serve as their guardians during their journey to the Forbidden Mountain where it is rumored the Monster of Wonderia lives.

Unbeknownst to the characters and the wonderfey, the Archfey of Wonderia, Abuelita Yvelise, resides there. Abuelita Yvelise is a sweet kindly storm giant who reveals the true nature of the wonderfey to the characters. The characters join the wonderfey in a ritual that takes place in the Archfey’s bag of holding where they must defeat vile fey creatures seeking to scare off the wonderfey from entering a portal that sends them to merge with each character’s soul at birth (time has no bounds in Wonderia!). The adventure concludes with the characters making choices that can completely reshape their own lives, including changing their race, class, gender, and other aspects of their character.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Anthony Joyce Lead Designer
  • Gordon McAlpin Graphic Design, Editing, and Layout
  • Cze and Peku Cartography
  • Allison Illustrations
  • Little World Art Illustrations

Items

  • Bag of Holding Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Common

item.title: WBW-DC-FDC-05 - Crumbling Castles & Candy Clouds
item.content:encoded:
Crumbling Castles & Candy Clouds

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on September 20, 2021

The legendary city of Castamella, held aloft by cotton candy clouds, has meandered peacefully across the skies of the Feywild for time immemorial. But when its spires suddenly begin to crumble and crash through the sky below, only the adventurers stand between this idyllic haven and certain destruction. As factions coalesce in a battle that reaches beyond the borders of the sky, you must delve into the saccharine underbelly of this Seelie society to discover the culprits and stop their deliciously evil plans.

Content Warning

Earthquakes, falling, food

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Emily Harmon Designer

item.title: WBW-DC-FDC-06 - The Landscape of Estorian LeFae
item.content:encoded:
The Landscape of Estorian LeFae

A 2 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on September 20, 2021

Canvas is a self-contained domain inside of a painting, protected by magic and housing secrets to be hidden in plain sight although in a place of art and creation, anything can become reality, and that in itself is dangerous as the ruler is a bit eclectic. This Domain of Pigment is located inside of a painting drawn of a large tree covered in moss, raised on the ground, and with water flowing out of the base forming a small waterfall. It is labeled "Season's Fleetings" by Estorian LeFae. The painting changes to reflect different seasons from an outside perspective as the domain ruler's position changes. Inside of the painting is a collection of stories and artwork unique to the fey. This domain is a self-contained archive although the archive may have been less preserved and more acquired in selfish desire.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Gabe Hicks Lead Designer
  • Elise Rezendes Editing
  • Graphic Design Gordon McAlpin
  • Nim Illustrations

item.title: WBW-DC-FDC-07 - A Meal to Remember
item.content:encoded:
A Meal to Remember

A 2 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on September 20, 2021

Dwindle is a domain of loss and loneliness: a vast desert realm where memory and mirage are one and the same. Born out of the desperate wish of a grieving djinni-king, the magic sands of Dwindle give life to the memories of those we have lost. Eidolons of long-dead companions roam the dunes as sandy apparitions, soughing with the wind that slowly erodes them. They are called the Departed. Forough Khanom (foe-ROOGH KHAH-noom), an elderly resident of Dwindle, is preparing an elaborate feast for a much anticipated visitor—the memory of her beloved late husband, who visits her once each year around the time of their anniversary. However, she awoke this morning to find her vegetable garden mysteriously trampled! Forough asks the characters to brave the dunes in search of ingredients from an oasis known as the Sabzi Knoll. She fears that if she offers her visitor a meager spread, he may never show.

Content Warning

Grief, memory loss

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Justice Arman Designer

item.title: DDAL-DRW-11 - Shadows in the Stacks
item.content:encoded:
Shadows in the Stacks

A 4 Hour Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 2 Released on September 13, 2021

Hoping to put names to the location descriptions you uncovered in Waterdeep, you head to Candlekeep. You are not alone. Some want what you have, others don’t want you to discover any more.

Content Warning

Illness (fictional, contagious, quarantine), madness, suicide (mention of thoughts)

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Greg Marks Lead Designer
  • Oliver Darkshire Designer
  • Ma’at Crook Sensitivity Lead
  • Ashley “Navigator” Lawson Editor
  • Rich Lescouflair Art Director and Graphic Designer

item.content:encoded:
To Walk the Cold Dark

A 4 Hour Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 2 Released on September 13, 2021

In search of the lair of the Tenebrous Creed, you search for the prison of an ancient evil imprisoned in the Thunderpeaks.

item.title: RMH-02 - Back to the Front
item.content:encoded:
Back to the Front

A 4 Hour Ravenloft: Mist Hunters Adventure for Tier 1 Released on September 13, 2021

Your quarry has been located, meaning that returning them to Alanik Ray is just a matter of getting to them. Unfortunately, a never-ending horde of zombies stands between them and you—can you complete your mission?

Content Warning

Violent despotism, execution by impaling, traumas of war, involuntary servitude, child soldiers, children in peril, grotesque body modification, gore, violence

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON14-1 - Hearts Amiss
item.content:encoded:
Hearts Amiss

A 4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on September 2, 2021

The city of Karador is the crowning jewel of Sarifal, but Lady Siofra worries that it has been trapped in its cycle of winter for too long. She seeks those not of the court to investigate the fey city and find out what is keeping it from blooming into spring.

Content Warning

Grief and mind control

Part One of the Fractured Winter series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

item.content:encoded:
The Lost Seasons

A 4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on September 2, 2021

Karador, the capital of the eladrin realm of Sarifal, remains trapped in winter. Whispers abound that Lady Ordalf is the cause, though no one knows why. Tarilyn Kendrick searches for answers as well as those brave enough to find them.

Content Warning

Grief, mind control, and torture

Part Two of the Fractured Winter series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

item.content:encoded:
The Ghosts of Grief

A 4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on September 2, 2021

The court of High Lady Ordalf remains mired in Winter. Snow falls as heavily as her people's hearts and they have begun to forget the joys of the other seasons. Is the cold fate of the fey court sealed?

Part Three of the Fractured Winter series.

item.content:encoded:
Unsafe Harborage

A 4 Hour Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 2 Released on August 23, 2021

item.title: DDAL-EB-18 - Scales of War
item.description: Nolzur’s Marvelous Pigments, Weapon, +3, 2 potions, and 3 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
Scales of War

A 4 Hour Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 4 Released on August 23, 2021

The united forces of the Five Nations march into the Mournland to wage war on the Lord of Blades. West of the Glass Plateau, they're met by an army the likes of which hasn't been seen since the heights of the Last War. Let battle commence!

Part Two of the Flames of War series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Alan Patrick Designer
  • Will Doyle Campaign Story and Development
  • Ashley Michaela “Navigator” Lawson Editing
  • Stacey Allan Art Direction and Layout
  • Mark Behm Artist
  • Olga Drebas Artist
  • Ralph Horsley Artist
  • Lee Moyer Artist
  • Wayne Reynolds Artist
  • Vance Kelly Cover Illustrator
  • Wyne Reynolds Cover Illustrator

Items

  • Nolzur’s Marvelous Pigments Very Rare
  • Weapon, +3 Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Cloud Giant Strength Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare

Legacy Events

Draconic Leverage

You captured the gold dragon Goryphael. She has been bound in chains and is guarded by alliance soldiers.

Heroic Victory

The Battle of Broken Tower showed the true might of the Five Nationas. The Lord of Blades’ armies were driven back. Morale is high and supplies are plentiful across the Field of Ruins.

Pyrrhic Victory

The Lord of Blades’ warforged armies claimed more victories than the Five Nations did during the Battle of Broken Tower. The alliance won, but the costs were steep, and morale and supplies are strained.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON13-1 - Lure of the Reefs
item.content:encoded:
Lure of the Reefs

A 4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on August 18, 2021

Ships have disappeared amongst the Norheim Islands, almost all of them carrying refugees from Norland. An expedition, sent to find the cause, has similarly vanished without a trace. Most blame lack of experience with the treacherous local waters, but a few whisper of a more sinister cause, something that lures the desperate to their doom. Initiates of the Flame are looking for powerful adventurers to help since the authorities have more pressing trouble.

Content Warning

Grief and mind control

Part One of the Hunters of the Sea series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON13-2 - Monsters of the Deep
item.content:encoded:
Monsters of the Deep

A 4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on August 17, 2021

Ships have been raided, their much-needed goods gone missing. Witnesses talk about a green dragon and its scaled servants, but there are hardly any trees on windswept Norheim, let alone a true forest. Regardless, the goods need to be recovered, the monsters dealt with. Are you up to the task?

Content Warning

Grief and mind control

Part Two of the Hunters of the Sea series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON13-3 - Wolves of the Sea
item.content:encoded:
Wolves of the Sea

A 4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on August 17, 2021

An expedition has gone missing. Rumors surface that reavers based in the pirate city of Westhaven are selling slaves to unscrupulous merchants. Is the expedition still alive? Can you uncover the slavers and rescue the expedition before it’s too late?

Content Warning

Sacrifice and slavery

Part Three of the Hunters of the Sea series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

item.title: DDAL10-10 - Burying the Past
item.description: Clockwork Amulet, Staff of Defense, Staff of Striking, and 2 scrolls
item.content:encoded:
Burying the Past

A 4 Hour Season 10 Adventure for Tiers 2 and 3 Released on August 12, 2021

The bombs are constructed, the plans laid. The only thing remaining is the easy part; stealing into an ancient, alien city full of nightmarish creatures from beyond the limits of sanity, setting the bombs, and escaping the city without getting caught before they detonate. Simple!

Part Ten of the Plague of Ancients series.

item.description: Spint Mail, +1, Spint Mail, +2, Wand of the War Mage, +2, Wand of the War Mage, +3, 2 potions, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
A Song of Spears

A 3 Hour Season 10 Epic for Tiers 2 and 3 Released on August 12, 2021

Kaskur and those loyal to him, in an attempt to show Old Goat what actual leadership looks like, entered Xorvintroth to rescue the missing clan members and bit off more than they could chew. However, they found something other than their kin in the ruins of the ancient Abeiran city—and unwittingly brought it back with them. Will their foolish endeavors spell the end of the Thuunlakalaga clan?

item.content:encoded:
The Final Curtain

A 4 Hour Ravenloft: Mist Hunters Adventure for Tier 1 Released on August 9, 2021

Over dinner, a friendly face asks you to venture to Emherst, a quirky village in Kartakass, in search of a missing person. No sooner do you arrive, than villagers start winding up dead. Who is behind the murders?

Murder, death by suffocation and poisoning, fire, gore and mutilation, performance anxiety, forced into a role, manipulation (gaslighting), drug and alcohol use

item.title: RMH-EP-01 - The Grand Masquerade
item.content:encoded:
The Grand Masquerade

A 4 Hour Ravenloft: Mist Hunters Epic for Tier 1 Released on August 9, 2021

You are approached by Alanik Ray, a master investigator working on behalf of a secret society. Seeking agents to aid in the search for a missing scholar, he asks that you attend the Grand Masquerade—a great ball in the city of Port-à-Lucine. Hope you brought your dancing shoes!

Content Warning

Possession, insomnia, oppressive aristocracy, forced impersonation, anxiety of living a lie, abduction

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Amy Lynn Dzura Designer
  • Ma’at Crook Designer

item.title: DDAL-EB-17 - The Final Tribute
item.description: Bracers of Defense, Crystal Ball of Telepathy, Greatsword, +2, Pipes of the Sewers, Ring of Mind Shielding, a potion, and 2 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
The Final Tribute

A 4 Hour Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 4 Released on July 5, 2021

Prince Oargev of New Cyre knows the location of the secret Cyran creation forge, but a grim litany of recent disasters has shaken his throne: plague, treachery, recession, and insurgency. This intelligence could buy him a chance to rebuild anew, but who’ll be his highest bidder?

Part One of the Flames of War series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Richard Green Designer
  • Will Doyle Campaign Story and Development
  • Ashley Michaela “Navigator” Lawson Editing
  • Stacey Allan Art Direction and Layout
  • Zoltan Boros Artist
  • Paul Scott Canavan Artist
  • Olga Drebas Artist
  • Jaime Jones Artist
  • Lee Moyer Artist
  • Vance Kelly Cover Illustrator
  • Jaime Jones Cover Illustrator

Items

  • Bracers of Defense Rare
  • Crystal Ball of Telepathy Legendary
  • Greatsword, +2 Rare
  • Pipes of the Sewers Uncommon
  • Ring of Mind Shielding Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare

Legacy Events

Green in Tooth and Claw

The green draong Vyndescille escaped! Surely it won’t be long before he returns to enact his terrible revenge?

Prince’s Favor

You exposed Vyndescille’s corruption and earned the gratitude of Prince Oargev. The prince sends New Cyre’s soldiers to join the attack on the Lord of Blades.

item.title: DDAL-EBEP-03 - The Rising City
item.description: Docent, Manual of Gainful Exercise, Ring of X-ray Vision, Tome of Clear Thought, Wand of Binding, Wand of the War Mage, +3, 5 potions, and 3 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
The Rising City

A 4 Hour Oracle of War Epic for Tier 3 Released on June 20, 2021

In this Epic event, an army of symbiont-enhanced soldiers guards the Emerald Claw as they excavate the daelkyr sanctuary beneath Metrol. To get past them, the adventurers need a diversion. A gang of scavengers camped in the city are willing to help, but they have their own demands—a long list of them, in fact!

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Legacy Events

Death is a Door

You died within the ruins of Metrol. Mysterious forces brought you back to life, but you don’t know who or what they are.

Riddle’s Gambit

You betrayed the Scraplord by siding with the docent inside the warforged colossus Norr, preventing Norr from being used for future warfare. The docent now accompanies the group.

Rise of the Colossus

The Scraplord raised the warforged colossus Norr from the ruins of Metrol, creating a diversion for you to sneak into the Creeping Nave. You’ll find fewer defenses inside!

item.title: DDAL10-09 - Recipe for Retribution
item.description: Portable Hole, Ruby of the War Mage, 2 potions, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Recipe for Retribution

A 4 Hour Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on June 8, 2021

The plan is in motion, and you must scour the width and breadth of Icewind Dale for the components to create explosive devices that an extra-planar stranger wants to use to bury the ancient, Abeiran city of Xorvintroth and seal away the horrors that reside within. You up to it?

Part Nine of the Plague of Ancients series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Story Awards

Chardalyn Poisoning

Characters who keep any of the chardalyn find the substance’s affinity for magic affecting them in inopportune ways. So long as the character retains the chardalyn (no matter the amount), they have disadvantage on saving throws against spells, and spell attacks against them have advantage.

item.title: DC-PoA-PM07 - I Would Like to Make a Return
item.description: Masquerade Tattoo and one other item
item.content:encoded:
I Would Like to Make a Return

A 2 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on May 31, 2021

Adventure Seed: I’d Like to Make a Return, Please

Someone once said all that glitters is not Gold. Two explorer friends find out this truth when they pick up an Orb from some ruins. Thanks to all their recent misfortunes they wish to return it to it's resting place. But they cannot do it alone and need to find an alturnitive way to do it.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Masquerade Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Walloping Ammunition (Arrow) Common

Part One of the A Cold War series.

Bear in Mind

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on May 28, 2021

An unlikely visitor to Caer-Konig heralds impending disaster. What mind-blowing threat lies concealed beneath the ice?

item.title: DC-PoA-MB-01 - Pit of Bones
item.description: Efficient Quiver, Orb of Time, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Pit of Bones

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on May 23, 2021

Adventure Seed: Out of the Woods

Something is going on around Lonelywood. Adventurers gone missing, rumors of artifacts being searched for, strange beings wandering the woods near town.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

  • Efficient Quiver Uncommon
  • Orb of Time Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Pass Without a Trace Uncommon

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON12-1 - Nothing Is Sacred
item.content:encoded:
Nothing Is Sacred

A 2–4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on May 19, 2021

The Moonshaes are plunged into shadow and with permission of High Lady Ordalf, survivors have made their way to Gwynneth, the only Isle spared from darkness. The Conclave needs heroes to execute their plans of survival in the face of the most powerful threat the Moonshaes have yet seen, the Slain.

Part One of the Pawns of Torment series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON12-2 - A Gift from the Queen
item.content:encoded:
A Gift from the Queen

A 2–4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on May 19, 2021

With the fate of the Moonshaes held in the balance, the adventurer’s path lies in the lost tomb of an ancient Queen. What answers could she possibly offer to loosen the Slain’s deadly hold on this world.

Content Warning

Body horror

Part Two of the Pawns of Torment series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

item.content:encoded:
Tempest of Malice

A 2–4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on May 19, 2021

The key to severing the chains of the Slain is located at Tempest Keep, and the adventurers must face the impossible—brave the wrath of the elements to harness the power of the storm.

item.description: Enduring Spellbook, Propeller Helm, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Haven (Isn’t Too Far Away)

A 2 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on May 19, 2021

Adventure Seed: Chwinga-chwinga. CHWINGA!

The panicked townsfolk of Caer-Konig prepare to abandon their homes, but food is scarce! Gathering for the exodus is difficult! Frightened hunters return empty-handed, driven away from bountiful hunting ground by spine-chilling, chanting specters! Can heroes replenish the townsfolk before their departure AND before the arrival of The Destructive Light?

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Enduring Spellbook Common
  • Propeller Helm Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Snilloc’s Snowball Swarm Uncommon

item.title: CCC-BMG MOON11-1 - A Darkened City
item.content:encoded:
A Darkened City

A 4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 12, 2021

Once brilliant Caer Callidyrr has darkened, and the Slain sits on the High King’s throne. Helpless to fight this unknowable enemy, the forces of light have asked you to infiltrate the enemy’s stronghold and learn all you can. Will you dare the shadowed streets of the capital of the Moonshaes to gain entry to the Court of the Slain?

Content Warning

Abuse, grief, mental illness, and mind control

Part One of the Somber Remnant series.

A Darkened Court

A 4 Hour Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 12, 2021

The Court of the Slain at Caer Callidyrr holds many intrigues and even more danger. Yet you must walk these darkened halls and speak in whispers to uncover the malevolent plots of the Slain. Careful, now. One wrong step or a misplaced word could mean exposure and oblivion.

Classism, graphic violence, grief, mental illness, and mind control

You have worked your way to the heart of the Darkened Court at Caer Callidyrr. There, you have a chance to pierce the shadows and secrets that surround and protect the Slain. Can you reveal the mystery of the greatest threat to the Moonshaes and will you survive to tell anyone else?

Cossum’s Universal Constructs

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on May 12, 2021

Adventure Seed: My, What Big Feet You Have

Cossum is a small but fast growing village on the northern shore of Maer Dualdon. The village is lucky to have a contingent of constructs built by a talented local inventor, Carol Borgwiggle. The constructs work as servants and laborers. Recently strange tracks from an unknown creature were discovered in the village coming from an area of the woods that is said to be haunted. Can the party uncover the truth before it is too late?

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

  • All-Purpose Tool, +1 Uncommon

The reach of the Shadowfell has come to Alaron! The Great Gark’s forces are intent on spreading the Howling Disease throughout the island, and the fey are in dire peril. Will you ride to their aid or will the shadow spread across the land?

A pair of elven wine merchants never appeared in Easthaven with their monthly shipment of wine after stopping at the historic Carlisle Estate. They are probably just overstaying their welcome at…The Grand Estate

item.title: DC-PoA-PJE-01 - Ragdoll Nightmare
item.description: Grey Bag of Tricks, Masquerade Tattoo, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Ragdoll Nightmare

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on May 3, 2021

Adventure Seed: I’d Like to Make a Return, Please

Return to seeing the world through a child’s eyes, when fear was real. Little Miss Paren and her father, Dolmark, have been having nightmares. Ever since the kobold ragdoll was given to her five days ago, nightmares and strange happenings around the house have them spooked. What’s worse, getting rid of the doll seemed to do nothing. The nightmares just spread! Their last hope is to return the doll from whence it came, and hope that whatever wants it leaves them alone.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Monster hunter Ko Windcrester has tasked you to help in his mission to stop the hauntings in the town of Easthaven. Investigate the strange events, find the buried secrets both past and present.

item.description: Dryyn’s Tentacle Whip, Living Armor, Living Gloves, 3 legacy events, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
The Dragon Below

A 4 Hour Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on May 2, 2021

In the depths of Valaara’s sanctuary, the Order of the Emerald Claw harnesses ancient engines of destruction to wage war on the surface world. Only the Oracle of War can stop them now—if the adventurers can get it to work!

Part Three of the Engines of War series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Bianca Bickford Designer
  • Will Doyle Campaign Story and Development
  • Ashley Michaela “Navigator” Lawson Editing
  • Stacey Allan Art Direction and Layout
  • Olga Drebas Artist
  • Wayne England Artist
  • Jon Hodgson Artist
  • Titus Lunter Artist

Legacy Events

Madness Unleashed

You freed Valaara, “the Crawing Queen” from the Deepest Hive, her demiplane lair in the depths of Khyber. Spinweave told you Valaara would only briefly be freed, and Spinweave wouldn’t lie to you. Besides, what’s unleashing one of the daelkyr between friends, really?

Making Trouble

Trez Zul revealed that the Lord of Blades is searching the ruins of Making for a creation forged hidden inside a secret Cyran government facility. The Lord of Blades is capturing and interrogating Cyran officers to uncover the location of this base.

Secret of the Triune

You gave the three genies bound within the Oracle of War a secret. What will come of this fledgling bond of trust between you and the Lamannian Triune?

A caravan carrying essential materials for a divine ritual that aims to help the people of Bryn Shander stave off the brunt of the Rime of the Frostmaiden attempts to make it through the treacherous passes along the Spine of the World.

However, suspicions fall upon the caravan members as some suspect it has been infiltrated by the Cult of Auril itself, threatening the ritual and the brave travelers that try to reach Ten-Towns with crucial supplies.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

  • Circlet of Blasting Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Frost Fingers Common

A 2 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on April 24, 2021

Cold Diggers

Gathered for the reading of the Last Will and Testament of a recently departed mutual friend, the adventurers must work together to locate and reclaim the inheritance that was stolen from them. Set in the town of Easthaven during the events of the Everlasting Rime.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

An anticipated rematch between the Reghed Nomads and the Goliaths of Wyrmdoom Crag is interrupted by disaster as one thing after another goes wrong! It falls upon the party to pick up the ball when others have let it drop!

At odds again, the Androma brothers compete with one another for the speakership of Good Mead. Despite their efforts, the residents have begun switching their preferences in favor of a dark horse candidate from outside of town. Meanwhile, a cleric from the south has arrived to investigate the appearance of a necromancer in the area and becomes involved with the political campaign.

An encounter with an insane kobold leads the adventurers into a deep mystery concealed within dark caverns. Can the adventurers unravel the clues to understand what horrors await them?

item.description: Boots of Levitation
item.content:encoded:
Volatile Thoughts

A 4 Hour Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on April 15, 2021

Just when you thought Realmspace-faring slavers were the worst thing that could cross your path, it quickly became apparent you were wrong—terrible things lurk in the depths of the longdead Abeiran city of Xorvintroth. And when faced with countless, unfathomable horrors infesting an ancient city of a long-dead civilization from another world there’s only one solution…explosives.

Shadows Under Ice

Like shadows under ice, a dark secret threatens this town. Townsfolk act out of the norm for themselves, and you are no less vulnerable. But you can give them the help they request and face the truth beneath the ice.

item.content:encoded:
The Great Chwinga Roundup

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on April 12, 2021

Mysterious sightings, hunters missing and personal items taken from the town of Easthaven. What Great evil are the chwinga up to? The town elders are concerned and you have been asked to find out the answer before the town falls to their evil plot.

item.title: DC-PoA-SUNLIT-01 - A Thief in the White
item.description: Grey Bag of Tricks, Masquerade Tattoo, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
A Thief in the White

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on April 8, 2021

Adventure Seed: I’d Like to Make a Return, Please

Something is causing a businessman in Easthaven to have the worst luck imaginable, and he thinks it’s a ghost. As adventurers, you’re well equipped to handle just that sort of thing and go to help this poor man. As usual for when things get weird in Icewind Dale, there’s much more to the story than a simple “haunting,” and you find yourselves helping an invisible town called Sunlit solve the bad luck mystery.

Part One of the Sunlit Hands series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Grey Bag of Tricks Uncommon
  • Masquerade Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Walloping Ammunition (Arrow) Common

item.description: Lantern of Tracking (Aberrations), Psi Crystal, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Dug Too Deep?

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on April 8, 2021

Adventure Seed: In Too Deep

You found what was causing the bad luck in Easthaven and realized it went much farther than that one part of Ten Towns. With the luck-depriving object in tow, you aim to return it to its rightful owners: a kobold tribe that runs a gem mine near Termalaine. When the people you mean to give it to show up, they are acting strange, confused, and hostile. You are now tasked with figuring out what has happened to the kobold tribe.

Part Two of the Sunlit Hands series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Lantern of Tracking (Aberrations) Common

item.description: Ring of Truth Telling, Shield of Expression, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
A Solstice Tradition

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on April 8, 2021

Adventure Seed: Snipe Hunt

Talk of a snipe, a legendary creature with magical feathers, comes to Lonelywood. It seems like nothing more than an interesting rumor, but it gives the people of Sunlit a great idea: a race to “hunt down” a snipe across the Lonelywood Forest. The game is on, all of Sunlit is excited, and you’re in on the fun. Let’s see what contests and circus acts pop up in this new solstice tradition.

Part Three of the Sunlit Hands series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Ring of Truth Telling Uncommon
  • Shield of Expression Common
  • 1 x Potion of Animal Friendship Uncommon

item.title: DDAL-EB-15 - Dream Eater
item.description: Bracers of Archery, Staff of the Woodlands, and 3 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
Dream Eater

A 4 Hour Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on April 5, 2021

Across Eberron, the spirits of the dead stir as the Order of the Emerald Claw draws back the veil to Dolurrh. To avert calamity, the adventurers must cut a deal with an infamous bonecaster of the Talenta Plains—the Dream Eater—and her pack of loyal tyrannosaurs.

Part Two of the Engines of War series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Celeste Conowitch Designer
  • Will Doyle Campaign Story and Development
  • Ashley Michaela “Navigator” Lawson Editing
  • Stacey Allan Art Direction and Layout
  • Eric Deschamps Artist
  • Olga Drebas Artist
  • Howard Lyon Artist
  • Lee Moyer Artist
  • Marc Sasso Artist
  • Dan Scott Artist
  • Vance Kelly Cover Illustrator
  • Adam Cook Cover Illustrator

Items

  • Bracers of Archery Uncommon
  • Staff of the Woodlands Rare

Legacy Events

Allosaurus Mount Pet

Dragon Spirit

In the mists of the Boneyard, you allowed the restless spirit of a silver dragon to latch onto your soul. While the dragon spirit dwells inside you, you are immune to the Frightful Presence of dragons and have resistance to damage from their breath weapons.

Dream Walker

You helped the Dream Eater lay the restless spirit of hte dragon Carnelian to rest. At the end of the adventure, choose one of the following rewards:

  • The Dream Eater performs a ritual that grants you resistance to necrotic damage for the duration of your next adventure.
  • If you chose the allosaurus mount as a reward, the halfling Norrin teaches it the “Talenta Dodge”. If the allosaurus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. (Norrin must survive the adventure to offer this training.)
  • If you chose the bracers of archery reward, the halfling Davric enchants your quiver with a luck charm. When you roll a 1 on a d20 for an attack roll with an arrow drawn from this quiver, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. (Davric must survive the adventure to offer this reward.)

item.title: DC-PoA-PM05 - Can You Tell Me How to Get to the East Haven Way

Can You Tell Me How to Get to the East Haven Way

A 2 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 30, 2021

While entering Good Mead, the party gets involved with a caravan merchant and a local brewer involving a missing shipment of Mead to Easthaven. Will the party be able to find out what happened to this shipment or will the people of Easthaven become angry due to the missing shipment?!

item.content:encoded:
Wine, Wizards and Song

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 29, 2021

Adventure Seed: Do You Know the Way to Lonelywood?

Two wine merchants from Waterdeep set off from Good Mead with a sleigh filled with wine and mead pulled by two strong horses. When they fail to arrive in Easthaven it is feared they’ve lost their way. Rumors abound of the wealth of these wine merchants, undead sightings near town, wizards causing mischief…and did anyone hear that singing?

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-04 - As Above, So Below
item.description: Cast-Off Armor (Breastplate), Guardian Emblem, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
As Above, So Below

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 25, 2021

Adventure Seed: Holy Auril, Mother of Cod

A lottery held under suspicous circumstances. A Paladin trying to do the right thing. Can the adventurers find the truth in time?

Part Four of the To Survive the Night series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Cast-Off Armor (Breastplate) Common
  • Guardian Emblem Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Detect Evil and Good Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-05 - Shard of Hope
item.description: Arcane Grimoire, +1, Illuminator’s Tattoo, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Shard of Hope

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 25, 2021

Adventure Seed: This Seems Familiar

When arcane experimentation creates artifacts that ensnare the mind and beguile the senses, only the bravest adventurers can resist the toxic temptation of desecration and darkness, to travel to where this evil lies and defeat it. Lies are brought to bear and secrets are revealed.

Part Five of the To Survive the Night series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Arcane Grimoire, +1 Uncommon
  • Illuminator’s Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-01 - Little Feet, Cold Nights
item.description: All-Purpose Tool, +1, Boots of False Tracks, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Little Feet, Cold Nights

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 24, 2021

Adventure Seed: My, What Big Feet You Have

Strange lights in the forest, claw marks on the doors of regular citizens, and worst of all; their beloved pets are being attacked and killed. The town of West Easthaven is under attack by unknown forces for nefarious reasons. Can our adventurers put together the clues to make sense of these strange events or will the citizens continue to be terrorized by these odd disturbances?

Part One of the To Survive the Night series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • All-Purpose Tool, +1 Uncommon
  • Boots of False Tracks Common
  • 1 x Scroll of Protection from Evil and Good Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-02 - A New Place to Call Home
item.description: Mirror of the Past, Mithral Armor (scale, barding only), and 6 other items
item.content:encoded:
A New Place to Call Home

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 24, 2021

Adventure Seed: Ageless Hunger

Undead pour from an abandon keep in The Frozen North, threatening the already tenuous balance of life in the Ten-Towns, as an unlikely benefactor seeks heroes in hopes of turning this keep into a future stronghold. Secrets and dangers await the heroes as they venture out into the unforgiving cold.

Part Two of the To Survive the Night series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Mirror of the Past Rare
  • Mithral Armor (scale, barding only) Uncommon
  • 6 x Bone-Tipped Arrow, +1 Uncommon

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-03 - Personal Fouls and Penalties
item.description: Cloak of the Manta Ray, Wand of Pyrotechnics, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Personal Fouls and Penalties

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 24, 2021

Adventure Seed: Goat-ball!

Morale in the small village of Goodenow has fallen to an all-time low with the suspicious death of the star goat-ball player on the eve of a big match. When a shadowy enemy begins to target a local team of bonesetters, the mystery deepens. Is it game over in Goodenow?

Part Three of the To Survive the Night series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Cloak of the Manta Ray Uncommon
  • Wand of Pyrotechnics Common
  • 1 x Potion of Watchful Rest Common

item.title: DC-PoA-SH01 - Escape from Murder Valley
item.description: Arcane Grimoire, +1, Illuminator’s Tattoo, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Escape from Murder Valley

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 24, 2021

Adventure Seed: This Seems Familiar

The characters wake up in a cave, inside a hidden valley full of dangers. Their armour, weapons, and gear have all been stolen. They will need to find, or craft new items, while trying to defeat or avoid the threats that lurk in Murder Valley: for a cult of Malar makes its home here, and an evil wizard is personally hunting the characters so that their heads can adorn his already packed walls.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Arcane Grimoire, +1 Uncommon
  • Illuminator’s Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-DCAF09 - An Ascent to Recall
item.description: Arcane Grimoire, +1, Illuminator’s Tattoo, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
An Ascent to Recall

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 23, 2021

Adventure Seed: This Seems Familiar

A hiking trip to a romantic spot goes awry. The mountain’s yetis are just one obstacle to worry about. Will love prevail once more?

Part One of the Targos Targeted series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Arcane Grimoire, +1 Uncommon
  • Illuminator’s Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-SN-01 - The Rider in Black
item.description: Alchemy Jug, Cloak of Many Fashions, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
The Rider in Black

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 22, 2021

Adventure Seed: A Dark Horse

When a mysterious new arrival comes to Good Mead and announces his intention to run for town speaker, the adventurers are pulled into a game of espionage and dark magic.

Part One of The Savage North series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Alchemy Jug Uncommon
  • Cloak of Many Fashions Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Alter Self Uncommon

item.title: DC-PoA-ICE01-01 - A Fateful Meading
item.description: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Silver Raven), Moon-Touched Shortsword, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
A Fateful Meading

A 2–4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 18, 2021

Adventure Seed: Do You Know the Way to Lonelywood?

A Case of Life of Death

A shipment of mead is missing a wagon, its captain and its merchants missing. You are asked to investigate—even the person who is desperate for closure and who gives you the case goes to you because no one else is willing. Will you and your fellow adventurers find out the fate of the wagon and the missing merchants? What awaits you when you do?

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Figurine of Wondrous Power (Silver Raven) Uncommon
  • Moon-Touched Shortsword Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DDHC-CM-01 - The Joy of Extradimensional Spaces
item.content:encoded:
The Joy of Extradimensional Spaces

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 15, 2021

A book leads characters on a quest to find a missing sage. This adventure, inspired by the Mordenkainen’s magnificent mansion spell, presents a memorable introductory mystery for new arrivals to Candlekeep.

Credits

  • Michael Polkinghorn Writer
  • Hannah Rose Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-02 - Mazfroth’s Mighty Digressions
item.content:encoded:
Mazfroth’s Mighty Digressions

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 15, 2021

A monstrous revelation sheds light on a book merchant’s scam. This adventure takes the characters from Candlekeep to Baldur’s Gate and includes a new monster: the gingwatzim.

Credits

  • Alison Huang Writer
  • Hannah Rose Edited
  • Hannah Rose Developed
  • Christopher Perkins Developed

item.title: DDHC-CM-03 - Book of the Raven
item.content:encoded:
Book of the Raven

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 15, 2021

A treasure map tucked inside a book leads adventurers to a remote hilltop chalet occupied by a secret society. This adventure has the trappings of a haunted house mystery and provides a possible route into the Shadowfell.

Credits

  • Christopher Perkins Writer
  • Kim Mohan Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-04 - A Deep and Creeping Darkness
item.content:encoded:
A Deep and Creeping Darkness

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 15, 2021

A book describing a mining disaster prompts adventurers to search for a missing town. This mystery keeps players guessing until the end and makes clever use of a D&D monster that rarely gets much love.

Credits

  • Sarah Madsen Written
  • Michele Carter Developed & Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-05 - Shemshime’s Bedtime Rhyme
item.content:encoded:
Shemshime’s Bedtime Rhyme

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 15, 2021

A catchy and contagious rhyme traces back to a sinister clockwork book. Trapped in one of Candlekeep’s cellars, the characters must figure out the best way to stop the spread of this odd contagion.

Credits

  • Ari Levitch Written
  • Michele Carter Developed & Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-06 - The Price of Beauty
item.content:encoded:
The Price of Beauty

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

A book about beauty shows the way to a secluded temple where beauty is only skin deep. Characters who don’t want to get embroiled in the temple’s mysteries should, at the very least, enjoy the bath and pedicure.

Credits

  • Mark Hulmes Written
  • Scott Fitzgerald Gray Developed & Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-07 - Book of Cylinders
item.content:encoded:
Book of Cylinders

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

Engraved cylinders contained within a book tell a gripping tale when rolled across wet clay. This adventure updates the grippli (distant relatives to bullywugs) for fifth edition and sheds some light on grippli society.

Credits

  • Graeme Barber Written
  • Kim Mohan Developed & Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-08 - Sarah of Yellowcrest Manor
item.content:encoded:
Sarah of Yellowcrest Manor

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

A haunted book points a ghostly finger at the perpetrators of an unsolved mass killing in Waterdeep. This mystery features urban and dungeon exploration, as well as a potentially new, otherworldly campaign villain.

Credits

  • Derek Ruiz Written
  • Scott Fitzgerald Gray Developed & Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-09 - Lore of Lurue
item.content:encoded:
Lore of Lurue

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

Adventurers become immersed in a storybook conflict involving Lurue the Unicorn Queen and Malar the Beast Lord, which leads adventurers to the corrupted Pool of Eternal Spring. Can they end the corruption for the good of the High Forest?

Credits

  • Kelly Lynne D’Angelo Written
  • Kim Mohan Developed & Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-10 - Kandlekeep Dekonstruktion
item.content:encoded:
Kandlekeep Dekonstruktion

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

A stolen book leads adventurers to a tower in Candlekeep that is more than what it seems. This adventure strikes a more light-hearted tone than the others, but the mystery and its revelations are well worth the journey.

Credits

  • Amy Vorpahl Written
  • Christopher Perkins Developed
  • Scott Fitzgerald Gray Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-11 - Zikran’s Zephyrean Tome
item.content:encoded:
Zikran’s Zephyrean Tome

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 15, 2021

A djinni trapped in a book offers a wish spell to adventurers to find a way to release him. The key to the djinni’s freedom lies with his former master, a mad wizard on the cusp of mastering elemental magic.

Credits

  • Taymoor Rehman Written
  • Christopher Perkins Developed & Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-12 - The Curious Tale of Wisteria Vale
item.content:encoded:
The Curious Tale of Wisteria Vale

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 15, 2021

A book holds the key to freeing Arrant Quill, who has languished in a demiplanar prison for years, waiting for a cure to his madness. The adventurers must administer the cure but Quill is not the greatest danger in this prison plane.

Credits

  • Kienna Shaw Written
  • Christopher Perkins Developed & Edited
  • Hannah Rose Developed & Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-13 - The Book of Inner Alchemy
item.content:encoded:
The Book of Inner Alchemy

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 15, 2021

A search for the missing pages of a book puts adventurers in conflict with the monks of the Immortal Lotus. Heroes who defeat these Shou villains and retrieve the pages can learn to make gloves of soul catching, a new and legendary magic item.

Credits

  • Daniel Kwan Written
  • Hannah Rose Developed & Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-14 - The Canopic Being
item.content:encoded:
The Canopic Being

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 15, 2021

A book brings a number of puzzling organ transplants to life. This adventure takes the characters from Candlekeep to Tashluta, a tropical city, and from there into an unusual dungeon harboring a fearsome threat to their future well-being.

Credits

  • Jennifer Kretchmer Written
  • Scott Fitzgerald Gray Developed & Edited
  • Christopher Perkins Developed & Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-15 - The Scrivener’s Tale
item.content:encoded:
The Scrivener’s Tale

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 15, 2021

A tome leaves its magical mark as adventurers struggle to contain the evil archfey trapped inside it. In this adventure, heroes are taken to the ruins of a forgotten kingdom and its ancient, subterranean library.

Credits

  • Brandes Stoddard Written
  • Christopher Perkins Developed
  • Scott Fitzgerald Gray Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-16 - Alkaaar’s Appendix
item.content:encoded:
Alkaaar’s Appendix

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 15, 2021

A book chronicles an unsolved mystery about a wandering stone golem in the desert of Anauroch. The golem is part of a larger mystery that unfolds as characters explore, ending with the discovery of a necropolis buried in the sand.

Credits

  • Adam Lee Written
  • Michele Carter Developed
  • Christopher Perkins Developed
  • Michele Carter Edited

item.title: DDHC-CM-17 - Xanthoria
item.content:encoded:
Xanthoria

Hardcover Adventure for Tier 4 Released on March 15, 2021

A fell grimoire helps adventurers end a fungal plague. But Xanthoria is more than just the name of the book; it’s the last word spoken by those who succumb to the plague, and adventurers who pursue the book’s leads will soon find out why.

Credits

  • Toni Winslow-Brill Written
  • Bill Benham Developed
  • Christopher Perkins Developed
  • Kim Mohan Edited

item.title: DC-PoA "Journey to Adventure" - Journey to Adventure
item.description: Candle of the Deep and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Journey to Adventure

Two 1 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventures for Tier 1 Released on March 14, 2021

Adventure Seed: Breaking Ice-olation

The frozen lands of Icewind Dale call out for heroes, but the path to adventure is fraught with wonders and perils untold. A new band of bold explorers have begun their trek into the proving grounds of this icy domain. New skills will be required, new powers gained, and arcane secrets decrypted in order to seek and find their glory.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Candle of the Deep Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Frost Fingers Common

item.title: DC-PoA-EK-WC01 - Wilderness Childcare
item.description: Grey Bag of Tricks, Masquerade Tattoo, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Wilderness Childcare

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 13, 2021

Adventure Seed: I’d Like to Make a Return, Please

A group of intrepid heroes head out and face the dangers of Icewind Dale, on a mission to return a lost child to its mother?

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Grey Bag of Tricks Uncommon
  • Masquerade Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Walloping Ammunition (Arrow) Common

item.title: DC-PoA-HAG-SF04 - Failing You
item.description: Cast-Off Armor (Breastplate), Guardian Emblem, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Failing You

A 2–3 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 13, 2021

Adventure Seed: Holy Auril, Mother of Cod

The Lottery result in Icewind Dale is as feared as it is considered sacred. While interference is heavily frowned upon, that does nothing to stop rumors of rigged results from spreading. To a local fisherman of Targos, the rumors are his only hope when his childhood love is chosen as that New Moon's sacrifice. Will the adventurers be able to prove the rumors are true? Or is this simply a desperate attempt to save his one true love?

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Cast-Off Armor (Breastplate) Common
  • Guardian Emblem Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Detect Evil and Good Common

item.title: DDAL10-07 - Into Darkness
item.description: Dark Shard Amulet and Mace of Smiting
item.content:encoded:
Into Darkness

A 4 Hour Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 11, 2021

Times have been especially hard on the goliaths of Wyrmdoom Crag, and losing the few hunters they have left to neogi slavers will certainly spell their doom. You must delve into the ruins of an ancient city buried beneath the Spine of the World. What secrets lay in the deep dark? Do they promise salvation or doom?

Part Seven of the Plague of Ancients series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Travis Woodall Lead Designer
  • Oliver Darkshire Designer

Items

  • Mace of Smiting Rare

item.title: DC-PoA-PM04 - Losing Your Mind
item.description: Smoldering Armor (Studded Leather) and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Losing Your Mind

A 2 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released on March 10, 2021

Adventure Seed: The Muttering Gnome

A mind is a terrible thing to waste. But when you lose your mind it can be even worse. The party investigates a gnome who entered into the party's camp repeating the same thing over and over again. What can do this to a person?

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Smoldering Armor (Studded Leather) Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Bless Common

item.title: DDAL-DRW-08 - The Harrowing of Hell
item.description: Chime of Opening, Oathbow, Scarab of Protection, 4 potions, and 3 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
The Harrowing of Hell

A 8 Hour Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 4 Released on March 10, 2021

King Hekaton’s soul is trapped in the Nine Hells—and the characters must brave trials on Avernus, Acheron, and in the mind of the storm giant king to win it back from the Lord of Lies.

Part Six of the Storm King’s Descent series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Greg Marks Lead Designer
  • Carl Sibley Designer
  • Scott Fitzgerald Gray Editing
  • Rich Lescouflair Art Director & Graphic Designer
  • Dyson Logos Cartography
  • Carl Sibley Cartography

Items

  • Chime of Opening Rare
  • Oathbow Very Rare
  • Scarab of Protection Legendary
  • 1 x Potion of Storm Giant Strength Legendary
  • 3 x Potion of Vitality Very Rare

Legacy Events

Burn, Baby, Burn

Asmodeus has imprisoned your soul within a soul coin and fed it to an infernal war machine’s engine, destroying your soul instantly. Not even divine intervention can resurrect you now. Your character is permanently retired.

No Exceptions!

You’ve broken one of Mahadi’s rules for the Wandering Emporium: “No fighting! No spellcasting! No exceptions!” You’ve been kicked out of the emporium, and are banned from ever entering it again.

Knight of the Giant Queen

You have sworn allegiance to Serissa, the storm giant queen, and have joined her court at Maelstrom. The vow you have sworn to her supersedes all other oaths.

item.title: DDAL-DRWEP-02 - Wings of Death
item.content:encoded:
Wings of Death

A 4 Hour Dreams of Red Wizards Epic for Tiers 3 and 4 Released on March 10, 2021

The treachery and master plan of Thay are at last revealed—and heroes are needed for a final assault to prevent the return of one of Faerûn’s greatest evils!

Content Warning

Cold weather hazards, possession, and slavery

Part Five of the Storm King’s Descent series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Greg Marks Lead Designer
  • Emily Harmon Designer
  • Garrett Colon Designer
  • Scott Fitzgerald Gray Editing
  • Rich Lescouflair Art Director & Graphic Designer

item.title: DC-PoA-CBB-03 - The Menagerie of Count Zapharry
item.description: Arcane Grimoire, +1, Illuminator’s Tattoo, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
The Menagerie of Count Zapharry

A 4 Hour Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 9, 2021

Adventure Seed: This Seems Familiar

The party has been hired as caravan guards by Bob Hogcollar “The Pet King”. He is a wealthy merchant, and owner of “Hogcollar’s Luxury Pet Supply”. While making their way through a mountain pass, the caravan is caught in an avalanche. caused by the sinister Count Zapharry, who seeks retribution against Bob Hogcollar.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Items

  • Arcane Grimoire, +1 Uncommon
  • Illuminator’s Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DDAL-EB-14 - From Dust
item.description: Gisaul’s Spellbook (Libram of Souls and Flesh), Tentacle Rod, a spellbook, 3 legacy events, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
From Dust

A 4 Hour Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 8, 2021

Deep beneath Metrol, the Order of the Emerald Claw is excavating the ruins of a haunted daelkyr sanctuary. Sulring Mroranon knows a sage who can provide vital information about the dig site, but there’s a catch—they’ve not been seen for over a century.

Part One of the Engines of War series.

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Andy Dempz Designer
  • Will Doyle Campaign Story and Development
  • Ashley Michaela “Navigator” Lawson Editing
  • Stacey Allan Art Direction and Layout
  • John Avon Artist
  • Conceptopolis Artist
  • Olga Drebas Artist
  • Justin Gerard Artist
  • Tomas Giorello Artist
  • Ilich Henriquez Artist
  • Lee Moyer Artist
  • Ilya Shkipin Artist
  • Vance Kelly Cover Illustrator
  • William O'Connor Cover Illustrator

Items

  • Gisaul’s Spellbook (Libram of Souls and Flesh) Rare
  • Tentacle Rod Rare
  • 1 x Dust of Disappearance Uncommon
  • 1 x Elixir of Health Rare

Spellbooks

  • Gisaul’s Spellbook: mage armor, ray of sickness, blindness/deafness, ray of enfeeblement, web, bestow curse, vampiric touch, blight, dimension door, stoneskin, Bigby’s hand, and cloudkill

Legacy Events

Desperate Measures

Spinweave taught you how to temporarily release Valaara from Khyber by performing a ritual in the Creeping Nave. This could prove…useful?

Survivors of the Thorn Expedition

Some members of the Thorn Expedition are still alive. Check who survived below:

  • Gisaul Varren
  • Drago
Tavern Tale Spinner

You impressed the dwarves at the Stone Golem tavern with your tale-spinning prowess. At the end of this adventure, you can return to the Stone Golem to carouse with the dwarves.

RollResult
1–2You gain a hipflask of Frostmantle Fire, a string dwarven liquor. If you drink from this hipflask as an action, you are immune to fear for 1 hour. You can drink from the hipflask three times before it empties.
3–4The dwarves etch your tale into the walls of the tavern, immortalizing your legend in dwarf lore. You begin your next adventure with 2 hero points.
5–6One of the noble dwarves is so impressed with your tales that she commissions a bejeweled ivory statue of you or one of your companions (value 1,500 gp, but can only be sold at market for 500 gp).

item.title: DDEP10-01 - Terror in Ten-Towns
item.description: Bracers of Archery, Chardalyn Earring (Headband of Intellect), Charlatan’s Die, Pole of Angling, a potion, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Terror in Ten-Towns

A 4 Hour Season 10 Epic for Tier 1 Released on March 4, 2021

As a beastly army approaches Ten-Towns from the south, heroes take the lead in fortifications and defense. But can the heroes’ optimistic hard work overcome the worst enemy—the towns’ distrust of one another?

Available on Dungeon Masters Guild.

Credits

  • Travis Woodall Lead Designer
  • Ginny Loveday Designer
  • Jonathan Connor Self Designer
  • Ashley Michaela “Navigator” Lawson Editing
  • Rich Lescouflair Art Director and Graphic Designer
  • Mark Behm Interior Art
  • Axel Defois Interior Art
  • Titus Lunter Interior Art
  • Robson Michel Interior Art
  • Claudio Pozas Interior Art
  • Travis Woodall Cartography

Items

  • Bracers of Archery Uncommon
  • Chardalyn Earring (Headband of Intellect) Uncommon
  • Charlatan’s Die Common
  • Pole of Angling Common

Story Awards

Defender of Easthaven

Alongside other skilled warriors, you successfully defended Easthaven, along with one of the other towns in the adventure.
